list.data: {"id":89336565,"title":"【西南计算机】海康威视最详细电话会议纪要新鲜出炉","description":"董秘：2017年上半年营业收入164.48亿，同比增长31.02%；归母净利润32.92亿，同比增长26.22%。地区上，国内营收114.79亿，同比28.11%，行业市场高于渠道。海外营业收入49.69亿，增长38.26%。受汇率影响较大，按美金结算，低一些，实际增速应该是31%-32%。公司增长符合预期，公司采取稳定毛利率毛利...","target":"/3985333022/89336565","user":{"id":3985333022,"profile":"/3985333022","description":"公共号：逍遥三无；ID:xysanwu","screen_name":"逍遥三无","profile_image_url":"community/201610/1479776763997-1479776776697.jpg,community/201610/1479776763997-1479776776697.jpg!180x180.png,community/201610/1479776763997-1479776776697.jpg!50x50.png,community/201610/1479776763997-1479776776697.jpg!30x30.png","photo_domain":"http://xavatar.imedao.com/"},"promotion":false,"answers":null,"tag":null,"score":null,"reply_count":1,"retweet_count":1,"topic_title":"【西南计算机】海康威视最详细电话会议纪要新鲜出炉","topic_desc":" 董秘：2017年上半年营业收入164.48亿，同比增长31.02%；归...","topic_symbol":null,"topic_pic":null,"topic_pic_hd":null,"pic_type":0,"first_pic":null,"pic_size":{"width":2,"height":1,"qrcode":false},"pic":"","view_count":11280,"created_at":1500898260000,"link_stock_desc":null,"link_stock_symbol":null,"strategy_id":0,"feedback":null}

{"id":89336549,"title":"女鞋品牌大玩多元化转型，千百度收购幼儿园后股价创52周新高","description":"女鞋和幼儿园，本是两个八竿子打不着的领域，这一次却一同出现在一家公司的公告中，会擦出什么样的火花？ 近日，千百度(01028)发布公告称，其将以6.2亿港元收购伊顿国际教育45.78%股权。后者为一间在国内以“伊顿”品牌经营幼儿园的教育集团，在中国有48家幼儿园，主要分布在北京、上海、南京等城...","target":"/6571616571/89336549","user":{"id":6571616571,"profile":"/6571616571","description":"在智通，读懂港股","screen_name":"智通财经app","profile_image_url":"community/20167/1470120729825-1494313538818.jpg,community/20167/1470120729825-1494313538818.jpg!180x180.png,community/20167/1470120729825-1494313538818.jpg!50x50.png,community/20167/1470120729825-1494313538818.jpg!30x30.png","photo_domain":"http://xavatar.imedao.com/"},"promotion":false,"answers":null,"tag":null,"score":null,"reply_count":0,"retweet_count":1,"topic_title":"女鞋品牌大玩多元化转型，千百度收购幼儿园后股价创52周新高","topic_desc":" 女鞋和幼儿园，本是两个八竿子打不着的领域，这一次却一同...","topic_symbol":null,"topic_pic":null,"topic_pic_hd":null,"pic_type":0,"first_pic":"http://xqimg.imedao.com/15d7480a8ed1583fd469cbac.png!186x186.jpg","pic_size":{"width":2,"height":1,"qrcode":false},"pic":"http://xqimg.imedao.com/15d7480a8ed1583fd469cbac.png!345x210.webp,http://xqimg.imedao.com/15d7480d7fd1533fd5387294.png!345x210.webp,http://xqimg.imedao.com/15d7481186f1593fe1c36d0c.png!345x210.webp","view_count":22682,"created_at":1500898236000,"link_stock_desc":null,"link_stock_symbol":null,"strategy_id":0,"feedback":null}

{"id":89329772,"title":"老韩学习心得---富瀚微","description":"$富瀚微(SZ300613)$ 学习心得 1、公司的芯片是安防领域的视频监控芯片 2、2013年末为78 人，2014 年末为94 人，2015 年末为 111 人，2016 年6 月末为112 人。员工真够少的，其中研发人员88人，研究生以上仅44人，公司高管没有技术出身的---------这么少的人员，研究生以上人员这么少，后劲是值得...","target":"/1484348349/89329772","user":{"id":1484348349,"profile":"/1484348349","description":"重仓、集中、长期持股，是牛人们获胜的法门。我是小白，还在学习中","screen_name":"投资者老韩","profile_image_url":"community/20175/1497180481937-1497180542615.jpg,community/20175/1497180481937-1497180542615.jpg!180x180.png,community/20175/1497180481937-1497180542615.jpg!50x50.png,community/20175/1497180481937-1497180542615.jpg!30x30.png","photo_domain":"http://xavatar.imedao.com/"},"promotion":false,"answers":null,"tag":null,"score":null,"reply_count":1,"retweet_count":0,"topic_title":"老韩学习心得---富瀚微","topic_desc":" $富瀚微(SZ300613)$ 学习心得 1、公司的芯片是安防领域的视...","topic_symbol":null,"topic_pic":null,"topic_pic_hd":null,"pic_type":0,"first_pic":null,"pic_size":{"width":2,"height":1,"qrcode":false},"pic":"","view_count":14960,"created_at":1500889156000,"link_stock_desc":null,"link_stock_symbol":null,"strategy_id":0,"feedback":null}

{"id":89329867,"title":"关于维信诺蒸镀设备的资料和讨论","description":"@MT熊猫 ，您好 在上一个帖子中，您留言提到蒸镀设备，上网查了一下资料，大致的情况是维信诺用的蒸镀设备肯定不是TOKKI的，一方面是因为三星和京东方基本把TOKKI的订单全部给包揽了，维信诺故而订不到，另一方面，TOKKI的造价昂贵，也不是昆山国显的理想选择。总之，维信诺没有选择TOKKI。 回到...","target":"/7816213565/89329867","user":{"id":7816213565,"profile":"/opening_mind","description":"追寻内心的平静和自由","screen_name":"慢跑者397","profile_image_url":"community/201611/1483170842050-1483170959108.jpg,community/201611/1483170842050-1483170959108.jpg!180x180.png,community/201611/1483170842050-1483170959108.jpg!50x50.png,community/201611/1483170842050-1483170959108.jpg!30x30.png","photo_domain":"http://xavatar.imedao.com/"},"promotion":false,"answers":null,"tag":null,"score":null,"reply_count":3,"retweet_count":1,"topic_title":"关于维信诺蒸镀设备的资料和讨论","topic_desc":" @MT熊猫 ，您好 在上一个帖子中，您留言提到蒸镀设备，上网...","topic_symbol":null,"topic_pic":null,"topic_pic_hd":null,"pic_type":0,"first_pic":null,"pic_size":{"width":2,"height":1,"qrcode":false},"pic":"","view_count":10286,"created_at":1500889291000,"link_stock_desc":null,"link_stock_symbol":null,"strategy_id":0,"feedback":null}
